thread.title: Retirement Insurance Products Are Disappearing. And That’s Dangerous.

author: Benjamin Harris
title: Retirement Insurance Products Are Disappearing. And That’s Dangerous.
text: Benjamin Harris (@econ_harris) is a visiting associate professor at the Kellogg School of Management and was the Chief Economist to Vice President Joe Biden. The market for retirement insurance products is slowly and silently disappearing. From annuities to long-term-care insurance to employer-provided health insurance, insurance products are becoming both less available and less popular.
